app.name: DomestIQ
search.title: Fumana Abasebenzi
consent.title: Imvume Yabucala
consent.message: Siqokelela kwaye sicubungula iinkcukacha zakho ngokuhambelana nomthetho we-POPI Act. Ngokuqhubeka, uyavuma iindlela zethu zokusetyenziswa kwedatha yakho.
landing.hero.subtext: DomestIQ inika amandla abasebenzi basemakhaya ukufumana umsebenzi oqhubekayo nokhuselekileyo — kwaye inike amakhaya uncedo ngokuqinisekileyo. Ifowuni kuqala. Zonke iilwimi ze-SA eziyi-11. Abasebenzi basoloko bekhululekile.
landing.worker.body: Izigidi zabasebenzi basemakhaya kulo lonke loMzantsi Afrika zithembele ekuthetheni ukufumana umsebenzi olandelayo. Xa umqeshi eyeka, kunokuthetha iiveki ngaphandle kwemali engenayo. DomestIQ iyakutshintsha oko. Yakha iprofayile yakho kanye. Ufunyenwe. Ubhukishwe. Ufumane izimvo.
landing.worker.b1_desc: Akusekho iiveki ngaphandle kwemali engenayo. Fumana iibhukhingi kwiselula yakho.
landing.worker.b2_desc: Izimvo, izincomelo, ne-CV ekhulayo nomsebenzi ngamnye. Ungaphindi uqale phantsi.
landing.worker.b3_desc: Amakhasimende aqinisekisiweyo. Yazi ukuba usebenzela bani phambi kokuba ufike.
landing.worker.b4_desc: Akufuneki i-imeyile. Akufuneki ukuthayipha. Cofa izithombe uthathe iselfie.
landing.worker.b5_desc: Bhalisa uze uncokole ngesiXhosa, isiZulu, Sesotho, Afrikaans — iilwimi ze-SA eziyi-11.
landing.worker.b6_desc: Simahla ngokupheleleyo kubasebenzi. Ugcina wonke uRandi owufumanayo. Akukho khomishini ethathwa kuwe.
landing.client.body: Akusafuneki ukuthembela ekuthetheni uze unethemba lokuhle. Bhrawuza abasebenzi abaqinisekisiweyo, abalinganiswe ngezinga kufutshane nawe. Bona imbali yabo yomsebenzi, funda izimvo zenyaniso, uze unxibelelane ngomzuzwana.
landing.client.b1_desc: I-ID ihlolwe, iirekhodi zolwaphulo-mthetho zihlolwe. Yazi ukuba ngubani ongena ekhayeni lakho.
landing.client.b2_desc: Isilinganiso senyaniso esivela kumakhaya okwenene, kunye nezincomelo ezibhaliweyo onokuzithemba.
landing.client.b3_desc: Ukukhangela okusekelwe kwi-GPS. Bona ukuba ngubani ofumanekayo kwindawo yakho ngoku.
landing.client.b4_desc: Bhukha kanye okanye rhoqo. Ukuvumelanisa kwekhalenda. Izikhumbuzo ezizenzakalelayo.
landing.how.ws1_desc: Cofa izithombe ukukhetha izakhono zakho. Akufuneki ukuthayipha.
landing.how.ws2_desc: Amakhaya akufutshane nawe abona iprofayile yakho, isilinganiso, nokufumaneka kwakho.
landing.how.ws3_desc: Khetha imisebenzi oyifunayo. Beka ishedyuli yakho namaxabiso akho.
landing.how.ws4_desc: Wonke umsebenzi omhle ufumana izimvo ezitsala umsebenzi ongakumbi.
landing.how.cs1_desc: Cwenga ngohlobo lwenkonzo, umgama, isilinganiso, nokufumaneka.
landing.how.cs2_desc: Hlola izilinganiso, izimvo, kunye neebheji zokuqinisekisa.
landing.how.cs3_desc: Thumela umyalezo okanye ucele ibhukhingi. Lungiselela iinkcukacha ngokuthe ngqo.
landing.how.cs4_desc: Uluvo lwakho lunceda uluntu kwaye lubavuza abasebenzi abalungileyo.
landing.services.subtext: Ukusuka kuncedo lwasekhaya ukuya kumakhono obuchwephesha. Abasebenzi babhalisa izakhono zabo. Amakhaya afumana kanye oko akudingayo.
landing.stories.s1_quote: Bendiqhele ukulinda iiveki phakathi kwemisebenzi, ndibuza abahlobo ukuba bayamazi na umntu. Ngoku ndifumana iibhukhingi veki nganye. Abantwana bam bangakwazi ukutya kakuhle.
landing.stories.s2_quote: Andikwazi ukufunda kakuhle kodwa izithombe nee-icon zenza kube lula. Ndizibhalise ngefowuni yam. Akukho mntu undincedileyo.
landing.stories.s3_quote: Ngaphambili, bendingenazo iziqinisekiso zokuba ndisebenza kakuhle. Ngoku izimvo zam eziyi-47 zeenkwenkwezi ezintlanu zithetha ngam. Amakhasimende andithemba ndingekafiki.
landing.stories.s4_quote: Ukufumana umncedisi othembekileyo bekuthetha ukubuza abahlobo uze unethemba lokuhle. DomestIQ ikutshintshe ngokupheleleyo oko.
landing.stories.s5_quote: Iibheji zokuqinisekisa zindinika uxolo lwengqondo. Ndiyazi ukuba ngubani oza endlwini yam. Oko kubalulekile xa unabantwana.
landing.stories.s6_quote: Ndibeka amaxabiso am. Akukho mntu uthatha isabelo kum. Ndenze R8,000 ngenyanga edlulileyo nge-DomestIQ kuphela.
landing.cta.body: Wonke umsebenzi owakha iprofayile yakhe udala ithuba. Wonke umuzi obhukha nge-DomestIQ wakha ukuthembana. Ndawonye, sakha into uMzantsi Afrika ongaze wayinayo — inethiwekhi ethembekileyo yomsebenzi wasekhaya oqinisekisiweyo.
landing.footer.disclaimer: DomestIQ liqonga lokuxhumanisa. Akukho budlelane bokuqeshwa obudalwayo phakathi kwabasebenzisi.
landing.trust.t1_desc: Idatha yakho ikhuselwe phantsi komthetho waseMzantsi Afrika
landing.faq.a1: Ewe, simahla ngokupheleleyo i-100%. Abasebenzi bagcina wonke uRandi abawufumanayo. Asithathi khomishini kumvuzo wabasebenzi. Iqonga lixhaswa yimali encinci yenkonzo ekhokhwa ngamakhaya.
landing.faq.q2: Ngaba ndifuna i-smartphone ukuze ndisebenzise DomestIQ?
landing.faq.a2: Udinga ifowuni enokufikelela kwi-intanethi. DomestIQ isebenza kuyo nayiphi ibhrawuza ye-smartphone — Android okanye iPhone. Akufuneki ukudawunlowda i-app. Ungade uyifake kwisikrini sasekhaya.
landing.faq.a3: Abasebenzi bangalayisha i-SA ID yabo kunye nesatifiketi sokukhululwa kolwaphulo-mthetho. Iqela lethu liqinisekisa la maxwebhu lize linike ibheji yekhaka legolide kubasebenzi abaqinisekiswe ngokupheleleyo. Abasebenzi abaqinisekisiweyo bafumana iibhukhingi ezininzi.
landing.faq.a4: DomestIQ ihambelana ngokupheleleyo nomthetho we-POPI Act. Idatha yakho yobuqu iyinkripthiwe, ayithengiswa kwabanye, kwaye yabelwana ngayo kuphela ngemvume yakho ecacileyo.
landing.faq.a5: Okwangoku sisebenza kwiidolophu ezinkulu eziquka Johannesburg, Cape Town, Durban, Pretoria, ne-Port Elizabeth. Siyanwenwela kwiidolophu ezingakumbi. Bhalisa ngoku nangona indawo yakho ingekabandakanywa.
landing.faq.a6: Amakhaya akhangela abasebenzi ngohlobo lwenkonzo nendawo, abona iiprofayile nezimvo, aze abhukhe umhla nexesha. Abasebenzi bafumana isicelo baze bakwazi ukwamkela okanye ukwala. Ungakwazi nokunxibelelana nabasebenzi ngokuthe ngqo ukuxoxa iinkcukacha phambi kokubhukha.
landing.faq.a7: Ngokuqinisekileyo. DomestIQ ixhasa iibhukhingi zexeshana neziqhubekayo. Nokuba udinga ukucoca okunzulu okwexeshana okanye umgcini-gadi waveki zonke, sikubhekele.
landing.faq.a8: DomestIQ ixhasa zonke iilwimi ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika eziyi-11 eziquka isiNgesi, isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sesotho, nezinye. Abasebenzi bangabhalisa baze banxibelelane ngolwimi abaluthandayo.
landing.cities.subtext: Abasebenzi namakhaya baxhuma kwiidolophu ezinkulu. Kukhula veki nganye.
landing.cities.not_listed: Awuliboni idolophu yakho? Bhalisa nangona kunjalo — siyanwenwela ngokukhawuleza!
landing.pwa.title: Faka DomestIQ Kwisikrini Sasekhaya
landing.pwa.desc: Fumana ukufikelela okukhawulezayo kwiibhukhingi, imiyalezo, nokunye.
